newsitem.title: UK: Metals people - Quest metals set up in London.
newsitem.headline: Metals people - Quest metals set up in London.

text.p: Mining and metals company Quest said on Wednesday it was forming a firm to trade and market metals in London.
A press release said, "The Quest Group and Nick French are pleased to announce the formation of Quest Metals in London."
The Quest Group includes Quest Mining, Chempro and Sassoon and Company, active in the mining, manufacture, trade and distribution of metals and metal based products.
"Quest Metals will be active in the trading and marketing of a broad range of metals and operate as an independent profit centre within the group," the release said
Nick French will head the trading arm in London.
French formerly a managing director of Wogen Resources is a seasoned and well respected trader.
During the two decades at Wogen French was involved in cobalt, cadmium, mercury and manganese trading.
The initial reaction from European traders on the formation of the Quest Group was seen as positive.
"French is a well respected trader and has a deep knowledge of the metals industry," one London based trader said.
The trader believed that that Quest will be largely involved in the trading of cobalt.
